version_description:
- Improved loading state for all tabs
- Fixed Communities not loading
- Fixed Live Group Immersion description

- Rate an immersion after it's over
- More reliable Live immersions list
- Added auto exit when live ends
- Fixed back button for live immersion
- Fixed live status in the cards
- Allows new users to see the content of the app without having to logging in or creating an account.
Improves user experience, fixes bugs and enhances existing features

- Improves video streaming quality
- Enhances user experience

- Improves the video/audio streaming quality of Group Immersions

- Adds the ability to easily get support, ask questions and share feedback through Soulvana Support Center

The brand new Soulvana 2.0 brings you several exciting features and improvements that will take your experience, healings, manifestations and all areas of your life to new heights and dimensions.

- Free version: Enjoy and use Free programs without having to get a paid subscription.
- 20+ Group Immersions: Browse, choose from and join any 20+ transformational Group Immersions. New titles are added weekly.
- Group Immersions every 60 minutes: All Group Immersions now start and repeat every 60 minutes. Missed a session? No problem. Want to experience again your favorite session? Now you can.
- Group Immersion Trailers: Preview and get a taste of any Group Immersion by playing a short Trailer.
- Favorite Group Immersions: Save your favorite Group Immersions for quick and easy access.
- Latest Group Immersions: Always know about the newly added Group Immersions
- Featured Group Immersions: Always know which Group Immersions are trending.
- Morning Meditations: Start your days the best possible way, and manifest perfect days.
- Evening Meditations: End your days the best possible way. Get a perfect night’s sleep so you can wake up well rested and refreshed.

Soulvana 3.0 has come with an entirely new experience for the users!

- Improves the performance
- Changes Group Immersion to audio experiences
- Enables the users to listen to group immersions with the cellphone locked to save battery
- Adds new sections in the main view
- New welcome for morning and evening
- New feature to hide user's picture
- Adds shorter intros for Group Immersions
- New design
- Fixes bugs

Welcome to Soulvana 4.0!
This amazing new version brings you a whole new experience, where now you can join any group immersion anytime! Listening to you we have redesigned the app for you with gorgeous new features! Please enjoy it!
This new version fixes all iPad layout issues with Soulvana 4.0 and it's main crashes, also enhances the user experience!

- Enables Group Immersion reviews
- Fixes bugs
- Enhances user experience

What about getting Free Premium access? Now if you refer friends through the app you get Free Premium days!
Also, this version fixes some minor bugs
